title: august 12: minimum wage
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the history of minimum wage. After, she remembers the 2012 Olympics concert. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
